messages.subject: RE: "knighting" title
messages.msgSnippet: Mr. Helm, I shall contact the widow of Kyoshi Bass and ask her, she is a friend of mine.  Hopefully she will know the specifics. Peace, Matt
messages.messageBody:
Mr. Helm,

I shall contact the widow of Kyoshi Bass and ask her, she is a friend of
mine. Hopefully she will know the specifics.


Peace,

Matt
